## JsonRpcProvider.marketBalance() method

looks up the Escrow and Locked balances of the given address in the Storage Market

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
marketBalance(address: Address, tipSetKey?: TipSetKey): Promise<MarketBalance>;
```
